Welcome to Dental Planet

Meet Our Doctors

Experienced specialists dedicated to your dental health

Dr. Ankur Vatsal

Master of Dental Surgery, Cosmetic Dental Specialist

With over 15 years of clinical experience, Dr. Ankur Vatsal specializes in cosmetic and restorative dentistry. His expertise includes dental implants, root canal treatments, crowns & bridges, smile designing, braces, and advanced digital dentistry with 3D scanning. Known for clinical precision and ethical care, he focuses on long-term oral health and patient comfort.

Know more about Dr. Ankur Vatsal

Dr. Khushboo Barjatya Vatsal

Masters of Dental Surgery, Pediatric Dentist

Dr. Khushboo Barjatya Vatsal is a compassionate pediatric dentist dedicated to the oral health of infants, children, adolescents, and children with special needs.

Pediatric / Child Dental Specialist
Know more about Dr. Khushboo Barjatya Vatsal
